Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.messages.actions

Interface UserAction

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtlasBuildAction, BuildAction, ChallengerPhaseAction, EndTurnAction, MoveAction, SelectBuildAction, SelectMoveAction, StartTurnAction, WorkerAction, WorkerSetupMessage
public interface UserAction
extends java.io.Serializable
UserAction class defines an interface which represents an action type sent by the client to the server. It triggers a particular server action based on the type of the action.
Author:
Alice Piemonti
See Also:
Serializable
